data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the county of Pabna prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Pabna, Rajshahi, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Pabna, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 3,161 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Father, answer the requests of your people in the county of Pabna.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Peshakar people.
Spirit, guide seekers in Pabna, Rajshahi, Bangladesh to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Pabna, Rajshahi, Bangladesh to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Pabna, Rajshahi, Bangladesh need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

location.name: Pabna
location.people_groups_list: Namassej (Hindu traditions), Bagdi (Hindu traditions), Baha'i, Mir, Chitrakar (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Namassej (Hindu traditions) (4,667,000), Bagdi (Hindu traditions) (2,879,000), Baha'i (11,000), Mir (49,000), Chitrakar (Muslim traditions) (6,200)
